sentences.en: For propinquity, come, we do a cup again!
sentences.cn: 为了咱们的亲近, 来, 我们再干一杯!

sentences.en: The neighbours lived in close propinquity toeach other.
They are both cousins of his, but not of the same degree of propinquity.
sentences.cn: 他们两都是他的表弟, 但是在血缘上不同程度相近.
他们是血统很近的表亲.

trans.tran_cn: （时间等方面的）接近，（血统上的）近亲关系，类似，近似
trans.tran_en: the fact of being near someone or something, or of being related to someone
